definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: The position of trainee is much the same as that of an intern in a hospital.
sentences.chinese: 見習員的地位和醫院裏的實習醫生很相似。

sentences.english: I am at present a trainee in the Liner Shipping Company.
sentences.chinese: 我現在大丸船運公司服務，任見習員。

sentences.english: Management Trainee Receives systematic training in the company.
sentences.chinese: 行政見習員在公司內接受有系統訓練。
